events.message: I just received the laptop I ordered last week, but unfortunately the screen has a large scratch across it. Can you help me with this issue?
The reported issue involves a scratched screen on the delivered laptop, categorizing this case under Product Defect for further processing.
This case has been assigned to agent Emily for expert handling of the reported product defect.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear your laptop screen arrived scratched. I’m here to help resolve this for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratch and confirm if the packaging was damaged when it arrived? This will help us expedite your claim.
I have attached the photos showing the scratch on the screen. The package did not appear damaged at all; it looked perfectly fine when I received it.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement laptop shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option suits you best.
I appreciate the quick offer. I would prefer a replacement, as I still want to use this model. Please proceed with the exchange.
We have arranged the replacement to be shipped to your address. You will receive a tracking number shortly. Please keep the damaged laptop until the new one arrives.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your replacement laptop and that it is in perfect condition. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Since you confirmed that the replacement arrived without issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
